name: Lone Lamp
description:
Let's go on an adventure! In this point and click experience, you explore the town of Domu. Will you escape or remain trapped here forever?

Features:
  • Charming characters
  • Delightful dialogue
  • Creative puzzles

How to play:
  • Use the mouse to pick up objects, talk to villagers, and complete puzzles.
  • Click and drag items in the inventory onto the environment where you would like to use them.
